title: $:/plugins/tg/toolbar
author: TonGerner
name: Top toolbar
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="http://tongerner.tiddlyspot.com/">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="http://tongerner.tiddlyspot.com/"/> This plugin creates a toolbar on top of the screen.
With buttons to replicate the functions normally only available in the sidebar and buttons for a few new functions: tagging in view mode, rename tags, delete a corrupt tiddler, list (open/all/recent/tags/untagged), new template tiddler, ... <<< ''Note:'' * ''This plugin needs my $:/plugins/tg/layout plugin for general layout settings (available at http://tongerner.tiddlyspot.com/)'' * ''As of version 4.0.1 several buttons in $:/plugins/tg/toolbar have been replaced by checkboxes in $:/plugins/tg/layout'' <<< Settings for the layout can be found in ~ControlPanel > Appearance > [[Plugin tweaks|$:/plugins/tg/layout/tweaks]]. The buttons in the toolbar can be switched on/off in ''~ControlPanel > Appearance > Toolbars > [[Top toolbar|$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Toolbars/TopToolbar]]''. Drag and drop to change the ordering. <<< ''Note:'' * This plugin incorporates a slightly modified version of [[Danielo's TagsSearch plugin|http://braintest.tiddlyspot.com/#TagsSearch-Plugin]] * If the standard search button (<>) is used: ** it needs to be the first button! ** the top bar needs to have an appropriate height and background color! * All 'List' buttons do not work via 'More actions'! <<<
